trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_SEQ_00<tab>Jude eagerly awaits you.

TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_SEQ_01<tab>Jude has tasked you with crafting aetherial amplifiers.
※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 150. Delivering items with a rating of 320 or more will earn greater rewards.

TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver the aetherial amplifiers to Jude. The chocobo in his breast has transformed into a mighty hobgoblin, and, thus emboldened, he would gladly have your company again once the time is right.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_TODO_00<tab>Deliver aetherial amplifiers to Jude.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_100_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let us jump straight into the next part of the process!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_001<tab>I ask that you would craft another vital part of the starlens.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_002<tab>You see, the operation of this particular type of telescope requires highly specialized magic.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_003<tab>While I understand the mechanics behind this magic, the sheer volume required far surpasses that at my disposal.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_004<tab>Please, might you be so kind as to craft aetherial amplifiers for me?

TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_005<tab>There are no words to express how thankful I am, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Not only are you assisting me with producing the starlens, but you continue to encourage me every step of the way!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_050<tab>With the aetherial amplifiers, I should finally be able to channel enough magic to operate our starlens!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_060<tab>Isn't she beautiful!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_061<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it's absolutely perfect! Thank you.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_100<tab>I've just finished looking over the last delivery. We are so close to having all the parts necessary to begin assembly!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JEROMERE_000_101<tab>Jude, today must be your lucky day─the ever-busy Jeromere has decided to grace you with his presence!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_102<tab>Wh-Who are these people!? No doubt they're here to extort coin from me! I must report them to the Studium's guard posthaste!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JEROMERE_000_103<tab>Thinking aloud again, are we?
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JEROMERE_000_104<tab>You need not worry. They are with me. In fact, they are members of the poetry group I mentioned. I brought them here so everyone could get acquainted.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_COOLFEMALE04142_000_105<tab>It's nice to meet you, Jude!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_106<tab>Sh-She's speaking to me!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JEROMERE_000_107<tab>Of course she's speaking to you. That is, of course, the reason we are here, is it not?

TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_COOLMALE04142_000_108<tab>Ah, you must be the crafts<var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> assisting Jude. Do also feel free to drop in on one of our poetry meets sometime, should it strike your fancy!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JEROMERE_000_109<tab>So what do you think? A magnificent group of people, are they not? We were just on our way to the Last Stand─would you care to join us?
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_110<tab>Steady now. Jeromere is trying to help you. He knows you have no friends, and is attempting to coax you out of your shell. You really should be thankful...truly.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_111<tab>Absolutely not.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_112<tab>Apologies, but I am currently in the middle of producing something known as a starlens. Perhaps another time...
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JEROMERE_000_113<tab>What is this nonsense!?
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JEROMERE_000_114<tab>Come now, Jude. Join us just this one time. Only regret awaits, should you continue down this dark path.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_115<tab>How can you say that with such certainty?
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JEROMERE_000_116<tab>I...
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_COOLMALE04142_000_117<tab>Trust me, he knows exactly what he's talking about!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JEROMERE_000_118<tab>Please, that's enough. L-Let us just be on our way, shall we?

TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_119<tab><sigh> Having to meet new people is quite draining... I must say, however, I'm rather proud of myself. Normally, I would have been so nervous, even the thought of speaking would cause me to lose consciousness! I must be growing.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_A1_000_001<tab>You did well.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_A1_000_002<tab>You're improving.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_A1_000_003<tab>Get a hold of yourself!!!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_121<tab>It is you I have to thank, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Your continued support has allowed me to really blossom.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_122<tab>B-But I am calm...!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_123<tab>...Did I just speak up for myself? It seems I have changed even more than I initially thought since meeting <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_124<tab>I see! It was a test. No doubt <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> was trying to see just how much I have grown!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_125<tab>Now enough about me! We are so close to the finish line. With just a bit more work, the starlens will be complete!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_126<tab>Before we proceed, however, there is one thing I must confirm.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_127<tab>Please come back to see me when you next find the time.
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_JUDE_000_128<tab>Thanks to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the chocobo in my heart has transformed into a mighty goblin!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_SYSTEM_000_129<tab>Jude is overjoyed with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Good-natured Individual<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_AKTKLA204_04142_SYSTEM_000_130<tab>A new quest continuing the story of the Faculty of Astronomy is now available.
